field.name: summary
field.value: Allow [Import] attribute on the classes which will be imported

field.name: description
field.value:
The current solution for importing classes is somewhat ugly:
[ActiveRecord] [Import(typeof(ImportClass), "ImportClass")] public class MyActiveRecord : ActiveRecordBase ...
public class ImportClass
It would be more interesting if we change the location of the attribute:
[ActiveRecord] public class MyActiveRecord : ActiveRecordBase ...
[Import(typeof(MyActiveRecord), "ImportClass")] public class ImportClass

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: 1. The change assumes we won the imported type, which is not always a case. 2. With criteria and linq being the preferred approach now, I don't really think this is worthwhile.

comment.author: mzywitza
comment.text: This would change the semantics of the current solution, breaking existing code. The issue is not important enough for it.
